trans-unit.source: Iterates over the matching parent node according to the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath"></xref>, parent axis rules.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il nodo padre corrispondente in base al <xref href="System.Xml.XPath"> </xref>, padre di regole dell'asse.

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato del navigatore cambia solo se il <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A>metodo ha restituito `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The node from which you start traversing the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Il nodo da cui iniziare l'attraversamento dei nodi.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter"></xref> class, which enables you to filter nodes based on the name.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter"> </xref> (classe), che consente di filtrare i nodi in base al nome.
Restituisce lo spostamento del risultato corrente.

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato del navigatore cambia solo se il <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A>metodo ha restituito `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator on the next matching parent node.
trans-unit.target: Posiziona l'iteratore sul nodo padre corrispondente successivo.

trans-unit.source: If the next matching parent node exists, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se il nodo padre corrispondente successivo esiste, il metodo MoveNext imposta il <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A>proprietà spostamento del risultato corrente; in caso contrario, il <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A>proprietà rimane invariata.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the next matching parent node exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è presente il successivo nodo padre corrispondente. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
